mapper.select: SELECT FAQ_CODE, FAQ_CATEGORY, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as created_at FROM FAQ ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAQ (FAQ_CODE, FAQ_CATEGORY, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT, CREATED_AT) VALUES (LPAD(FAQ_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 3, '0'), #{faq_category}, #{faq_title}, #{faq_content}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR FAQ_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
